Q_DESC:
Create 3 classes namely house, address and room.

Let room contain length, breadth and height as members and following member functions:

1.getroom(): to read length, breadth and height of a room
2. putroom():to print length, breadth and height of a room

Include house number, city and state to be the members of the class address with following member functions:
1. getad(): to read house number, city and state
2. putad():to print house number, city and state

Let house contain house name, address (already declared class), room (already declared class) and no. of rooms as members and following member functions:
1. input(): to get house name, address, no. of rooms and room details
2. display():to display house name, address, no. of rooms and room details

Input:
The first line of the input must contain a single string denoting the house name.
The second line of the input must contain single space separated house number, city and state.
The third line of the input must be the no. of rooms.
The subsequent lines of input must have length, breadth and height of each room
Constraint: No. of rooms  10

Output:
The output must print the details of the house.
TESTCASE_1:
Rangavilas
25 Coimbatore Tamilnadu
2
12 14 20
14 14 20
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
House name=Rangavilas
House No=25
City=Coimbatore
State=Tamilnadu
House Details 1
Length=12
Breadth=14
Height=20
House Details 2
Length=14
Breadth=14
Height=20
